title: How About Something New?
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Riko! I brought a book today that I highly recommend.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waah, really? I’m so happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>There was this one novel you lent me that was recommended by Setsuna, remember? I’ve been quite hooked on the series ever since I read that.... They released a spin-off of it recently!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>They did!? I didn’t know that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Let’s go to a cafe again and read it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Sure! Umm, actually.... I also brought a book that I want you to try, Umi-chan. If you don’t mind, would you like to read that as well?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Your recommendation is always good, Riko. I’ll gladly read it! So, what is it about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, it’s a secret. It’s the one I bought when we went to that bookstore together. You said you were interested in it, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah! It’s that crowded bookstore! The one where the employees really put a lot of effort into their promotional decorations....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s it! I hope you’ll also like it, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
